title: RPG Music Pack: Dungeon Themes III
description: Gear Yourself With 10 Dungeon Music Themes Suited For Any RPG, RTS, or Fantasy Title!
longDescription:
RPG Music Pack: Dungeon Themes III


Click Here to Listen to the Demo


Gear Yourself With 10 Dungeon Themes, Suited For Any RPG, RTS, or Fantasy Title!


-----


This RPG Music Collection consists of 10 tracks, offering a unique selection of loop-able tracks, allowing you to mix and match them as needed. In total, you'll enjoy over 4 hours of completely original music.


To enhance the atmosphere of your project, utilize the LIGHT variant for moments of melancholy, while the MEDIUM version sets a more subdued tone. Seamlessly transition between the MEDIUM, LIGHT, and FULL versions. Immerse yourself in a tailored audio journey that seamlessly adapts to the mood of your game.


Get the Ultimate RPG Music Collection Here


-------


What You Get:


Dungeon Themes III

  • "Abyss Walkers" - (Loop) [2:28]
  • "Another Realm" - (Loop) [3:02]
  • "Palace of Gehenna" - (Loop) [2:16]
  • "The Places We Forget" - (Loop) [2:12]
  • "Leave -- Now" - (Loop) [2:34]
  • "Dreamscape Dungeon" - (Loop) [2:28]
  • "Lonely in the Dark" - (Loop) [2:57]
  • "Ancient Grotto" - (Loop) [3:26]
  • "The Hidden Tomb" - (Loop) [2:21]
  • "Ebon Depths" - (Loop) [2:34]


WATCH HERE: RPG Music Pack: Dungeon Themes III (YouTube Video)


-------
technicalDetails:
Embark on Your Adventure with this Music Pack, Featuring:

◆ 1.0 GB of high-quality WAV files (16Bit / 44.1 kHz]

◆ 10 full-track looped songs

◆ 3 variations for every track

◆ 1 hour and 49 minutes of music

◆ Unlimited Royalty-Free license

◆ FREE updates forever

◆ Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5 • Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5


---------------


Owl Theory is Comprised of Composers:

  • Alec Weesner - www.alecweesner.com
  • Adam Weesner - www.adamweesner.com
